HELPEMBED_footer: Use '{0}help <command>' for more info on a command.
HELP_help: Show the help message, or more details on a specific command.
HELP_quote: Quote a message using a message ID or link.
HELP_clone: Clone up to 50 messages from one channel to another using a webhook.
HELP_personaladd: Add a Personal Quote that only you can quote in any mutual server.
HELP_personalclear: Remove all of your Personal Quotes.
HELP_toggledelete: Toggle deleting quote command messages in the server. Requires the 'Manage Server' permission.
HELP_togglelinks: Toggle quoting linked messages in the server. Requires the 'Manage Server' permission.
HELP_togglereaction: Toggle quoting by adding :speech_balloon: reactions to messages in the server. Requires the 'Manage Server' permission.
MAIN_quote_noperms: **I don't have permissions to fetch messages from that channel.**
MAIN_quote_inputerror: **Please specify a valid message ID or URL.**
MAIN_clone_msglimit: **You can only clone up to 50 messages.**
PERSONAL_personallist_noquotes: **There are no Personal Quotes on this page.**
